attributes.action: Getting 16- 60 plus age groups into work , and means test incapicity benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To encourage the DWP, to promote people between the ages of 16-60, who claim incapicity benefit, to be means tested, and have independant medicals.
Also apply rule to immigrant workers, who choose tom move to Uk, to avoid  national service in eu and non eu countries, by promting armed forces as an option employer to a brighter future

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
